exclusion: Tap the button on aërQ Sensor 3x times within 1 second.
inclusion: Tap the button on aërQ Sensor 3x times within 1 second.
label: ZWA039
overview: Small sensor that offers monitoring of temperature, humidity, dew and mold. Uses a CR2477H battery with up to 2 years' lifespan.
wakeup: Tap the button once to wakeup aërQ Sensor.

parameters.label: Minimum Temperature change to report
parameters.description: This value defines the minimum change of temperature to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.
parameters.overview:
If the value is set to 0, there will be no reports sent to the controller, when the temperature changes. However, periodic reports, managed by configuration parameter 4, may still be active.

Temperature is checked once every 15 minutes to determine if it should be reported based on this setting.

parameters.label: Minimum humidity change to report
parameters.description: This value defines the minimum change of humidity to cause an unsolicited report of humidity to the central controller using Lifeline.
parameters.overview:
If the value is set to 0, there will be no reports sent to the controller, when the humidity changes.

However, periodic reports, managed by configuration parameter 4, may still be active.

Humidity is checked once every 15 minutes to determine if it should be reported based on this setting.

parameters.label: Check interval for minimum change on parameters 1 and 2
parameters.description: This value determines how often aerQ Sensor checks for minimum change in temperature or humidity  on Parameter 1 and 2 or when the Sensor wakes up by button pressing.
parameters.overview:
Check interval for minimum change on parameters 1 and 2. (ZWA039 V2.0 or higher)

This value determines how often aerQ Sensor checks for minimum change in temperature or humidity

on Parameter 1 and 2 or when the Sensor wakes up by button pressing. Value is set in minutes.

parameters.label: Periodic Reports
parameters.description: This parameter defines the time interval to send an unsolicited report.
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines the time interval to send an unsolicited report.

If the value is set to 0, there will be no periodic reports sent to the controller.

However, reports on temperature/humidity changes, managed by configuration parameters 1 and 2, may still be active.

parameters.label: Temperature Upper Watermark value
parameters.description: This parameter defines a temperature.  If the measured temperature surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 2.
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines a temperature.

If the measured temperature surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 2.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 10.

parameters.label: Temperature Lower Watermark value
parameters.description: This parameter defines a temperature.  If the measured temperature dropps below this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 3.
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines a temperature.

If the measured temperature dropps below this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 3.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 9.

parameters.label: Humidity Upper Watermark value
parameters.description: This parameter defines the relative humidity.  If the measured relative humidity surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 4.
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines the relative humidity.

If the measured relative humidity surpasses this watermark a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 4.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 12.

parameters.label: Humidity Lower Watermark value
parameters.description: This parameter defines a relative humidity.  If the measured temperature drops below this relative humidity a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 5.
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines a relative humidity.

If the measured temperature drops below this relative humidity a BASIC command is sent into Association Group 5.

The value of BASIC SET is defined by parameter 11.

parameters.label: Low Temperature Trigger BASIC Set Command Value
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 3.
parameters.overview:
This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 3.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: High Temperature Trigger BASIC Set Command Value
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value be sent out into association group 2.
parameters.overview:
This defines what BASIC SET command value be sent out into association group 2.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: Low Humidity Trigger BASIC Set Command Value
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 5.
parameters.overview:
This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 5.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: High Humidity Trigger BASIC Set Command Value
parameters.description: This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 4.
parameters.overview:
This defines what BASIC SET command value shall be sent out into association group 4.

Value meaning:

255 = ON.

0 = OFF.

1 - 100 = Defines a level between 0 - 100% if controlling dimmers.

parameters.label: Offset value for Mould environment notification
parameters.description: This value allows to increase the humidity threshold for ideal mould environment notification by max 10%.
parameters.overview: This value allows to increase the humidity threshold for ideal mould environment notification by max 10%. (default 0 value will set to trigger at humidity levels above 70%)

parameters.label: Offset value for Temperature
parameters.description: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate temperature when checked.
parameters.overview:
Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate temperature when checked.

Scale is defined by Param 64. e.g. Value 15 means 1.5C or 1.5F.

parameters.label: Offset value for Humidity
parameters.description: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate humidity when checked.
parameters.overview: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate humidity when checked.

parameters.label: Check interval for Upper/ Lower Watermark value on Parameter 5 ,6,7 and 8
parameters.description: This value determines how often aerQ Sensor checks for upper/lower watermark value in temperature  or humidity on Parameter 5 ,6,7 and 8.
parameters.overview: This value determines how often aerQ Sensor checks for upper/lower watermark value in temperature or humidity on Parameter 5 ,6,7 and 8.

parameters.label: Temperature Scale
parameters.description: This parameter sets the temperature scale.
parameters.overview: This parameter sets the temperature scale: Setting 1 = Celsius, Setting 2 = Fahrenheit.

parameters.label: Sensor report after inclusion
parameters.description: This value determines which sensor report will be sent after the inclusion is complete.
parameters.overview:
This value determines which sensor report will be sent after the inclusion is complete. Default Value: 15.

Setting (bit field) Description 1+2+4+8=15

options.label: Bit 1 Temperature sensor report. (0 = disable, 1 = enable)
Bit 2 Humidity sensor report. (0 = disable, 1 = enable)
Bit 3 Dew point sensor report. (0 = disable, 1 = enable)

parameters.label: Reset Parameter
parameters.description: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.
parameters.overview: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults. Setting 1 – 4294967294 =  Reset all Parameter settings to their default settings, Setting 4294967295 = Completely factory reset sensor and send device reset locally notification.
